about_the_game: Experience the explorative adventure and journey the way it was meant to be experienced. King of Mazes with its true adults only payoff.

content_descriptors.notes: King of Mazes involves the main character involved in sexual encounters. It includes sexual themes, innuendoes and depictions of characters undressing, naked and in sexual congress.

detailed_description: Experience the explorative adventure and journey the way it was meant to be experienced. King of Mazes with its true adults only payoff.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8 or later
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8 or later
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: King of Mazes Adults Only 18+ Patch

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Vista or higher
  • Processor: 1Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible card
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Vista or higher
  • Processor: 2Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible card
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Experience the explorative adventure and journey the way it was meant to be experienced. King of Mazes with its true adults only payoff.
